Package org.forgerock.openidm.filter

Class MutableFilterDecorator

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.filter.MutableFilterDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
Direct Known Subclasses:
MaintenanceFilter
public class MutableFilterDecorator extends Object implements org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
A CREST Filter decorator that allows the decorated implementation (delegate) to be changed at runtime. Initially, this decorator wraps a PassthroughFilter.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MutableFilterDecorator()
    Construct a mutable filter decorator which delegates to passthrough behavior, i.e., no filtering.
    MutableFilterDecorator(org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter delegate)
    Construct a mutable filter decorator which delegates to the given delegate.
